function ERI_EP04_06()
    --.起-4【11月第2週】「天井からこんにちわ」
    SaveData.Title = "天井からこんにちわ"

    --//BG：4F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[From then on, every day was busy due to the unpredictable actions of Hermes-san.]])

    --//BU：ヒユ（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0303.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Anxious "E-Erika Sister! Hermes-sama has appeared in classroom 1-A and caused a panic!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1011.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Anxious "Ehh!? I'm coming now!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//BG：1-A教室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014aa")
    --//BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0225.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smiling "Ah, Erika-chan, yaho yahoー<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])

    MSG([[Standing in the center of the teacher's podium, Hermes-san lightly danced while waving her hand at me.]])

    MSG([[Perhaps enchanted by that dance, almost everyone in 1-A gazed at Hermes-san with dreamy eyes. It was a bizarre sight I'd never seen before.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1012.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Anxious "Hermes-san, w-why are you in 1-A!?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0226.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smiling "Just a feeling!!! Today, I felt like doing a guerrilla live in 1-A～～!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1013.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Anxious "What kind of feeling is that!?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0227.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smiling "Ehehehe, then, music start<sprite="Emoji" name="note">"]])

STOP_BGM()
    --//BGM：OPのイントロが流れ始める
PLAY_BGM("BGM99_Inst.wav",500,true)
WAIT(1000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1014.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Serious "Music stoooop!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    --//BGM：OP停止
STOP_BGM(500)

    MSG([[The intro of the song that had been playing from somewhere suddenly stopped.]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1015.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Wry smile "Um, if Hermes-san suddenly starts a live in a place like this, it would cause a huge commotion."]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1016.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Wry smile "If you tell me, I'll properly set the venue and time. For now, let's calm down, okay?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0228.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Sad "Boo. But you're right, Erika-chan. Sorry about that."]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[Looking remorseful, Hermes-san hung her head and stepped down from the podium.]])

    MSG([[...Thank goodness. It seemed she understood somehow.]])

    MSG([[I was deeply relieved that nothing serious happened.]])

PLAY_VOICE("reika_0019.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Female Student】 "Eh... we can't watch Hermes-sama's live..."]])

    MSG([[The moment someone muttered that in class, Hermes-san twirled around and danced back to the center of the podium.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0229.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smiling "That's not true!! After all, I'll start the live right here right now! Music<sprite="Emoji" name="star"> come on!"]])

STOP_BGM()
    --//BGM：OPのイントロが流れ始める
PLAY_BGM("BGM17.wav")
WAIT(1000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1017.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Serious "Stop stop! No come on!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    --//BGM：OP停止
STOP_BGM(500)

    MSG([[That was close. This time, the live was about to begin for real.]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[As expected of a top idol. The speed of her actions after hearing the fans' voices shocked me.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0230.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Sad "Uuu... I'm sorry that there are kids looking forward to my live..."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1018.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Sad "Please restrain yourself. If you start the live here, more people will end up sad than happy."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0231.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Serious "But, but! If it's my live, I'm confident I can make even those who are sad smile at the end! That's the mission of Hermes Himegami!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1019.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Sad "Th-that's not the point..."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0232.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smiling "Music<sprite="Emoji" name="star"> onnnn"]])

STOP_BGM()
    --//BGM：OPのイントロが流れ始める
PLAY_BGM("BGM99_Inst.wav",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1020.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Serious "I, Ikusa-style arrest technique!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0233.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Surprised "Fuwaa~~~~!?"]])
    --//BGM：OP停止
STOP_BGM(2000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)

    MSG([[In the end, we had no choice but to restrain her with arrest techniques and forcibly take her out of the classroom.]])

    MSG([[Furthermore, in the boys' division as well...]])

    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//BG：男子部校舎（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ba")
    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0273.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "It's supposed to be the start of classes by now... but no teachers have come."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0641.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised "Today, we’re supposed to have regular classes, not self-study."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0072.wav")
    MSG([[ 【#1】Normal "Hm? Do you hear some noise from above?"]])

    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、エルメス（笑顔）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ea")
    --LAYER_POSITION(60,-400,0)
    --//effect：エルメスが上から降ってきて、先輩たちを押し潰すような演出で

    PLAY_SE("SEc047.wav")

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-400,80)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,-400,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-400,-500,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0234.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Winking "Suuurpriiise～～～～～～～ <sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERU01ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-400,0)
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, -400, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0003")
    MSG([[ 【Seniors】 "Hogeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!?"]])

    MSG([[Suddenly, Hermes-san broke through the ceiling and fell, and the seniors standing right under the fall point were crushed beneath her.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0642.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Anxious "S-Seeeeeeeeeenpai!?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0235.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Surprised "Wawawa! Sorry, sorry! I should've checked properly if anyone was below!"]])

    MSG([[When Hermes-san jumped away from the seniors, they happily stood up.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、エルメス（笑顔）、先輩たち（興奮）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-500,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,100,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0074.wav")
    MSG([[ 【#1】Excited "Please don’t worry about it."]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0047.wav")
    MSG([[ 【#2】Excited "Being stepped on by a national idol is..."]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_1000.wav")
    MSG([[ 【#3】Excited "More like a reward... heh heh heh."]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0236.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smiling "Then that’s goodー<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Next time, I’ll make sure to fall right on top of the three of you."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0643.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Sad "Um... please come in normally. If you keep making holes in the ceiling every time you appear, the boys' division classrooms will collapse."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[The building was already doubtful as to whether it was safe to use. If more collapse happens, we boys' division will completely lose our place.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,100,0)
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0237.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Sad "Hawawa, sorry, sorry."]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0238.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Sad "Since it's my first time meeting the boys' division members other than Mina-chan, I wanted to surprise them."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,100,0)
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0239.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smiling "First impressions are important to become close friends!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0274.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "I don't get it. If you want to be careful about first impressions, you should definitely just enter normally."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,100,0)
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0240.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Surprised "Hoe?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0275.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "No, it's not 'Hoe?'."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,100,0)
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0241.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smiling "I’ll ask my mother to fill in the holes I made in the ceiling next time <sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Since we’re at it, let’s also redecorate the ceiling with a rabbit pattern!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0276.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "N-no. Enough. I won’t pursue how you enter anymore, but just patch the holes normally. Got it?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0242.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smiling "Yes, pyon<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0277.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "Your sentence ending turned into a rabbit. You really understand, right? Don’t actually make the ceiling rabbit patterned."]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0243.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smiling "Pyon pyon<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0278.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "...I'm worried."]])

    MSG([[Even Ouga-kun was taken aback by Hermes-san’s carefree nature, and I couldn’t help but chuckle.]])

    MSG([[Spending time together like this, I began to understand why Hermes-san had gained nationwide popularity.]])

    MSG([[Though she causes one trouble after another, her expressions and behavior show she has no malice.]])

    MSG([[On the contrary, Hermes-san always acts for someone's smile. That’s why even if she causes us trouble, we can’t hate her.]])

    MSG([[She might be best described as someone who grew up as a pure-hearted child.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,100,0)
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0244.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Normal "Mina-chan, what's wrong? Is there something on my face?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0644.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Wry smile "No. I just think Hermes-san is amazing."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,100,0)
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0245.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smiling "I'm amazing? Yay! Even though I broke the ceiling, you praised me! Mina-chan, I love you!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0279.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "Hey Minato, don’t spoil her too much. Sarcasm won’t get through to her."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0645.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Wry smile "I-I know, I know. I’m definitely not being sarcastic. I really think she’s amazing."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

--;吉★　テキスト修正「確かず」→「確かめず」（2020/02/01 12:55)
    MSG([[Those words came from my honest feelings. But precisely because of that, I couldn’t help but want to confirm.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0646.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Normal "After all... she's the one who took the 'Princess Emperor' title from Marika-nee-san."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[—Whether Hermes-san was involved in the incident that Marika-nee-san got caught up in. The truth of that.]])

    MSG([[I tried murmuring loudly enough for Hermes-san to hear, wondering what she would reply. Secretly, I raised my gaze to check her expression.]])

STOP_BGM(1500)

    MSG([[Then—]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,100,0)
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0246(2).wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Sad "The way you said that... is not cute."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0647.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Anxious "Eh?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[Hermes-san wore a deeply sorrowful expression.]])

    MSG([[Regretting my extremely hostile words, I was about to apologize. But before that—]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0127.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Female Student】 "It's here! According to eyewitness testimonies, Hermes-sama has been summoned and confined in the boys' division!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0128.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Female Student】 "How despicable!? That's why we can't forgive the boys' division!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0129.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Female Student】 "If Hermes-sama is really there, let's tie up all the boys right on the spot!"]])

    MSG([[Voices of girls came from the school building entrance. It seemed they had come chasing after Hermes-san.]])

    MSG([[I don’t know what information they heard, but they were clearly agitated.]])

    MSG([[If they saw Hermes-san crying now, it would definitely become a disastrous situation.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0280.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "Minato, seniors, and Lady Hermes. Let's escape through the window before this becomes troublesome."]])

--;吉★　テキスト修正「煙幕をはって」→「はって」（2020/02/01 13:06）
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0648.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Serious "Yeah! I'll set up a smoke screen at the entrance to buy us time."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[While Ouga-kun escaped through the window with Hermes-san, I ran to the entrance and held a smoke bomb.]])

    MSG([[I wanted to ask Hermes-san the truth, but now wasn't the time.]])

    MSG([[Or rather, after seeing such a sorrowful face, I couldn’t bear to ask. If it was acting, she was an incredible actress.]])

    MSG([[What on earth happened between Hermes-san and Marika-nee-san? The mystery only deepened.]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0130.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Female Student】 "Hermes-sama aaaaaaaaahhhhhhh!!!"]])
    --//SE：化け物の動き（ズァァァア！！）
PLAY_SE("SEz003.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[From the depths of the dark corridor, monstrous footsteps could be heard.]])

    MSG([[But I wasn't shaken. With this smoke bomb made by my master, even a wild bear could be deterred.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0649.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Serious "Ikusa style arrest technique '<r=もとべいそう> Headquarters Ikusa </r>'!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I threw it with full force! The ceramic bomb broke, and the powdered flint rubbed to ignite the gunpowder, ...ignite, ignite...?]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0650.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised "It didn't ignite."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[Come to think of it, I was told to use it soon or the gunpowder would get damp and useless. It was given to me a year ago, so maybe it expired.]])

    MSG([[Oh well, too bad. I'll go get a new one from my master's house when I have some free time again.]])

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ・Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
	LAYER_POSITION(60,200,0)
	LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
	LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
	LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.InSine)
	SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0131.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Female Student】 "Look!!! There are boys over there!!!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0132.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Female Student】 "They’re prey!! Let’s catch them and make them reveal Hermes-sama’s whereabouts!!!"]])
    --//SE：化け物の動き（ズァァァア！！）
PLAY_SE("SEz003.wav")
WAIT(400)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0651.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Anxious "Gyaaaaaaaaaaaa!?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I couldn't afford to be careless! I jumped out the window to escape the girls chasing me at full speed.]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    --　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP04_07")
end
